name: Super Zombie Slots
description:
The most unique slots experience on the App Store: You won't find another slots game like this one!

Main features:
- Fun and unique slots!
- Easy to play!
- Discover many different slots in many worlds!
- More than 100 symbols throughout the game!
- Win more than 75 different prizes!
- Stop the reels when you want!
- Stop all reels at once or one by one!
- Aim for the jackpot!
- Gorgeous and unique illustrations!
- Amazing sounds and music!

Notes:
- No real money and no real world prizes can be won through this game.
- This game uses optional coins to enhance the game. These coins can be purchased for real money or won inside the game.
- For entertainment only.
